scripts.build: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('tools/rslib-plugin/dist',{recursive:true,force:true})" && pnpm -C tools/rslib-plugin exec tsdown --config tsdown.config.ts && cp tools/rslib-plugin/*.md tools/rslib-plugin/dist && cp tools/rslib-plugin/package.json tools/rslib-plugin/dist && cp tools/rslib-plugin/executors.json tools/rslib-plugin/dist && mkdir -p tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/build tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/dev tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/echo && cp tools/rslib-plugin/src/executors/build/schema.json tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/build/schema.json && cp tools/rslib-plugin/src/executors/dev/schema.json tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/dev/schema.json && cp tools/rslib-plugin/src/executors/echo/schema.json tools/rslib-plugin/dist/src/executors/echo/schema.json
